# Large Ice Tank Refrigeration Plant Insulation Contract

## Official Government Tender Announcement
### Reference Number: CB-935-45553190

The National Research Council Canada is issuing a request for proposals for the re-insulation of five large ice tank refrigeration plant, located at the Council's Building, 1 Arctic Avenue, St. John's, Newfoundland and Labrador.

### Tender Details
*   **Solicitation Number:** 24-58049
*   **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (Ontario)
*   **Procurement Category:** SRV
*   **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open bidding
*   **Tender Status:** Expired
*   **Trade Agreements:** Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement, Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement, Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canadian Free Trade Agreement, and World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement.

### Project Description
The National Research Council requires the re-insulation of five large ice tank vessels in the refrigeration plant using "Cryogel Z" type insulation material. The project includes the installation of inspection ports to ensure future maintenance operations.

### Tender Requirements

*   Compliance with the National Research Council's rules and regulations
*   Full-time, on-site work by a team of 2 skilled workers
*   Experience in similar projects, with detailed examples of previous work
*   Material inspection reports.

### Submission Guidelines
*   All proposals must be submitted in both English and French, via email, to [Jonathan.Soles@nrc-cnrc.gc.ca](mailto:Jonathan.Soles@nrc-cnrc.gc.ca).
*   Contact details: Jonathan Soles at 343-548-9258.
*   Tender notice attachments are available at [www.canadabuys.ca](http://www.canadabuys.ca).

### Important Dates

*   [Attachment 1 (PDF)](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/40064/24-58049-qa-1.pdf)
*   [Attachment 4 (PDF)](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/40064/24-58049-drawings-english.pdf)
*   Tender notice attachments and instructions for tendering are available at [www.canadabuys.ca](http://www.canadabuys.ca). ).
